reviews.review: This game is good and fun but it gives me new anger issues
只能说，很好玩，只是总是掉线

Es una puta mierda, es un juego diseñado SOLO PARA JUGAR SIENDO ASESINO, si elijes jugar sobreviviente, te aseguro que NO TIENES NINGUNA POSIBILIDAD DE GANAR,no solo que eres lento, el asesino tiene habiliadades que te espotean, te frenan, te hieren, MIL VECES MAS RAPIDO QUE TU, te golpea no importa la distancia que haya,no importa si saltaste des ventanas, te golpeará igual.
Es demasiado abuso la diferencia abismal de asesinos y sobrevivientes. Entras al juego solo a morir. Una cagada.
didnt know what life was until i installed this game, not only did it make my penis grow 15 ft,  i achieved life service
Absolutely abysmal, horrible game that is genuinely unpleasant to play 100% of the time, highly recommend 10/10

they for real ruined the game with the latest update. ive never seen a game try to sabotage years of meta play in favor of appealing to a vocal base ("killers") who continuously makes the quality of life worse for the game LOL its so sad and i hope for the longevity of the game itself they balance the game better. it is genuinely a killer sided game.
真吓人，我经常慌不择路
avoid this game at all cost. It's too addicting and full of hackers!
Good game, I can play it all day and not get bored of the game. Cons: Toxic Survivors and killers.
QUE PORONGA SE VOLVIO , TODA LAS VENTAJAS PARA EL KILLER CON ESTA ACTUALIZACION. ES ASI

I use to love playing dbd, but since this new update I absolutely hate it. The updates for the perks and how gens take longer to do is just ridiculous. The game was hard enough as it was, especially with toxic killers, but now it seems like the creators just made shit easier for the killers which is not the kind of update this game needs. the perks and gens were just fine before. I don't know why they thought this would be a good idea. Like spine chill has a cool down.... SPINE CHILL, tf? I can't play dbd anymore with these updates. I want to enjoy the game. Not get pissed every time I play, especially with my friends.
人类有三大欲望，修机，救人，溜鬼，而在这 三大欲望中，修机是满足人类胜利需求的条件,所以,满足修机的进度,在这三者中啊，优先性是第一位.如果能在修机的过程中，修了完美的一台机,也能使人类无比愉快,而在游戏中,存在着对于这种快感执着追求的人,我们通常把这种人称之为机皇,而本局游戏，则专门为那些厌倦世间常见修机方法的人类，量体裁衣，提供符合他们身份的技能(厄咒：毁灭）（心惊肉跳）
Fun if you like to be murdered over and over. 5 Stars , would get killed again.

its well balanced now. survivors who are crying need to understand, the game is not killer sided. if you lose, the killer is just better. suck it up. you've had the game favour you for a long time now. accept that it's gone.

Hello. I really like this game ,but there are a lot of bugs , today game is crushing all day and after it i cant play . PLZ DO SOMETHING WITH YOURS SERVER
Es bueno pero tuene algunos bug q deben arreglar pero es bueno

As a survivor main who has played this game across 3 consoles, the newest state of dbd is the worst it has been since i started playing when the trickster released. 

For being a killer this game is fun, it plays to your rules and screws the survivors in your favor, want broken hitboxes? here you go, want to be speedy so the survivors have no chance of outrunning you or looping you? no problem :)

for the survivors, you have no chance of escape, short bursts of speed let you gain minimal distance on the killer and the hitboxes on killers are broken to hell with you being hit on the other side of a pallet by Michael's tiny kitchen knife, the game is plagued by killer mains who tunnel and camp leaving no chance for you to escape if you are on the unfortunate end of being tunneled or camped

After getting some experience on survivor i have learned to have a bit of fun with killers and most killers can be tamed with a boop or two, Murderous masked man? just a tap on the nose, ghostface? not a problem he's a goodboy now.
Solo Q is hell rn but the perk reworks are cool 8/10 i have put too many hours into this game and will continue to do so.
morirme de los primeros, el game

Hoy fuí al entierro del papa de una amiga; según la religión de ellos, llevan al cementerio una vidente para saber quien va ser el próximo en morir. Una vez allí la vidente se concentró y dijo que el primero que saliera del cementerio iba a morir esta semana. Aquí estamos todavia en el panteón... Todos!!!. Hemos pedido pizza , pollo asado , refresco y café; hay gente jugando a la Baraja y lotería, nadie ha salido. Ni siquiera la pinche vidente !!! ... ando buscando un enchufe para el cargador igual de aqui no me muevo. Lo que me apura es que me vine en la bici del vecino y la deje Afuera de seguro ya se la chingaron.
Oyunun yapısı güzel tasarım hoş içerikleri gayet ilgi çekici fakat katillere gelen güçlendirme yüzünden oyun biraz kötü bir duruma giriş yapmış.Umarım en kısa zamanda düzeltilir. Tek şikayetim budur.
only thing i miss is hopkins lab, everything else is five stars

Muy buen juego la verdad, si eres fan del terror, te va encantar el juego, un modo donde eres asesino o sobreviviente, donde corres el peligro que llegue el asesino sin previo aviso a golpearte, cuenta con una gran lista de asesinos y sobrevivientes, cada asesino tiene sus habilidades, al igual que los sobrevivientes, tiene muy buenos gráficos, entre mas lo juegues mas experto seras, lo único es que si quieres todos los logros tendrás que gastar dinero real y que a veces los jugadores como asesinos y como supervivientes son muy tóxicos pero de ahí en fuera  buen juego, recomendado

It used to be a really fun game to play solo or with friends. With the latest patch, it just isn't worth it. I've probably escaped 2 times out of my last 15 or 20 matches. Killers just tunnel or camp to get a survivor out of the match quickly, almost assuredly securing them a win. They nerfed the perks that you would use to dissuade getting tunneled. BHVR has shown repeatedly that they do not care about the playerbase - they just want cash from cosmetics and battle passes. Don't bother. 841 hours in and I'm hanging up my hat until things change. It is not new player friendly. It's not current player friendly. It rewards toxic behavior and winning at any cost. If that's your jam, go for it. For everyone else, you're better off just watching someone else play it.
Esse jogo é muito bala show
momentan is es leider viel zu killer lasstig .
i would rather eat cereal with water
it is a very good game i recommend it :)
Murderous Enjoyment, FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!

As a long time fan of the game, I am truly disappointed with the 6.1.0 update. It has pushed the game into the complete wrong direction. As it stands, both survivor and killer is unplayable. This is due to survivor gameplay being atrocious, resulting in no survivors playing and killer queue times increasing. Not only this, the perk and Bloodweb changes make zero sense and have not improved gameplay or the grind whatsoever.
Es buen juego pero hay algo malo me sale mucho una viñeta de  que se me crasheo y es muy constante

Been playing since beta and never have I had such an unfun experience as i have lately. If you're intending to play to survive or make plays in the new meta, dont get your hopes up. Uninstalled today for the first time since downloading. Game's in its worst state in years. Killers complain about not being able to kill survivors, so they have to camp/tunnel, so they nerf survivors and ever since, nothing but people who camp and tunnel. Since the new patch, playing multiple matches every night, i've had 2 matches without either a camper or tunneler. Not worth the time to download it rn, unless you play killer.
We were promised a bloodpoint bonus, where's our goddamn bloodpoint bonus BHVR?
Buenisimo el juego, más si lo juegas con amigos

seit dem letzten Update nahezu 0 spielspaß als Überlebender. Andauernd dieselben Killer und getunnelt und gecampt wird auch übermäßig mehr im Vergleich zu vor dem Update. Als Killer ewige Wartezeiten, da gefühlt wegen dem eben genannten kaum noch einer Überlebender spielt.

this is a great game the problems with it are:

Edit: I'm trying to get in more hours to leave a better review for the PC version. Will Update as needed.
I have over 2000 hours on console. I can honestly say this game has become worse and worse over the years and is an absolute nightmare to even try and enjoy. The community is so toxic and entitled it makes Rust look like a relaxing game of PvP. The game-play mechanics are.... outdated to say the least and if you are not a streamer then the developers honestly don't care for what you have to say about that and other problems you might encounter. Used to be an amazing game with amazing people, I don't know what happened but it's not the game that will be remembered as one of the good ones anymore. Only get this game if it comes on sale, even then, it's a hard game to enjoy.
PS: Enjoy the tunneling every game.
PSS: There are no repercussions for disconnected players that make them not want to disconnect, who cares, right?
